name: Brume (itch) (BaecunDrop)
description:
Brume is a roguelite platformer in which you reveal the level by dissipating the fog in

order to escape ruins.
Power Ups
Wall Jump: allows you to jump from walls; 
Multi Jump: extra jumps in the air; 
Hookshot: aim at a structure and grapple towards it; 
Hover: hover like a jetpack; 
Dash: dash in midair in the horizontal direction; 
Wall Refresh: your powers refresh as if touching the ground; 
Thrown light: a light ball that illuminates and powers batteries; 
Light Rail: a beam of light in a straight direction; 
Light Burst: a burst of light at a location.
